resources.string: As a user, I want to see my current location on a Google Map View. The app should handle the possibility of location services being off and permissions denied.
As a user, I wish to see a list of nearby places. The places should appear as markers on the map. You choose the type of place: cities, restaurants, parks, etc.
As a user, if I select a place from the displayed list, I should go to a page that displays more information about the selected place.

As a user, I want to see a picture of the nearby places. Query to find if images are available for the place, if not handle the error. Please use a spinner or activity indicator to let the user know an image is loading.
